talk0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_00>Hey!<sp:5:1:0> My granddaughter still has a lot to
learn before she can talk to a voe.

If you need something, just come talk to
me instead, OK?
talk0050:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Everyone's here! It's time for the
Kids Klub!

Let's start with our "Fun Things" reports!<sp:5:1:0>
What did everyone do today that was
the most fun?<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_00>For me, it was listening to the "<clr:0000>Voe and
You<clr:ffff>" <clr:0000>class<clr:ffff> that my big sister Kalani
is attending!
<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>I was only able to look in from outside, and
I couldn't hear the lesson at all, but it was still
fun to try!<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
talk0051:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting_00>Oooh, me next! Me next!


Aaq showed me a <clr:0000>secret map<clr:ffff> and it was
really neat!

<sp:3:0:2:0800>And!<sp:5:0:0> And!<sp:5:0:0> I also want to check out the
<clr:0000>Gerudo Secret Club<clr:ffff> where Aaq's mama
works as a salesper-son!
talk0052:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>For me, hmm...<sp:5:0:0> I really liked playing
with Mattison's <clr:0000>sun balloon<clr:ffff>...

But I also loved singing the Hudson
Construction song!<sp:5:0:0>

<snd:Humming_00>♪Quick and quality, blink and we're
done...<sp:5:0:0>mmm...<sp:5:0:0>mmm...<sp:5:0:0>everysooon!♪
talk0040:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Aaqlet! Did you hear? Did you hear?


There's gonna be another kid like you
coming to Gerudo Town! She was living
outside of town, but soon she'll be here!
talk0041:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>What! Really?


<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>I wanna be friends with that vai too!


But when is she coming? <sp:5:0:0>Is it soon?
<sp:5:0:0>Say it's soon!
talk0042:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>The soldiers went out to meet her a little
while ago, so it must be any day now!

She's coming from some place in <clr:0000>Akkala<clr:ffff>
called <clr:0000>Tarrey Town<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>So far! <sp:5:1:0>Like, way up
in the northeastern part of Hyrule...
talk0030:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I tried <clr:0000>hiding with the voe dummies<clr:ffff> in the
room, but my outfit looks different from
theirs and I got caught.
I wonder what I could do to hide better...
talk0043:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>I'm gonna wait patiently for her, then.<sp:5:0:0>
I hope we all get to play together soon!
talk0031:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>What are we gonna talk about at Kids
Klub today?
talk0033:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Oh! Hello, mister voe! I'm happy that we
can finally talk!

I was definitely real scared of talking
to you at first, but I did want to talk!<sp:5:0:0>
I promise!
talk0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Didja know...um...the bomb flowers go
BOOOOM!<sp:5:1:0> And the yellow zappy things
are all...um...BZZ-BZZT!
Oh, and the white ones go all CRAAACK!
AND! <sp:5:1:0>The red ones go BOOSH! 'Cause
of all the fire!
talk0034:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Don't worry! When we get more things to
sell, I'll definitely describe them to you!
It's fun!
talk0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I'm taking a little break from helping out
at Vaba's shop.

I'm on my way to listen to the lessons
my big sister Kalani is learning in class!
talk0035:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Wakeup>I have to help out at the shop again
tomorrow, so I should go to bed...
talk0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL>Ah! Eye contact! And the eyes are close
to the mouth, and the mouth is where I'd
be speaking from if I talked to that voe!
I-I-I've got to hurry to the "<clr:0000>Voe and You<clr:ffff>"
<clr:0000>class <clr:ffff>so I can ask how to talk to voe!
talk0036:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh, but it's my bedtime now. Can we talk
tomorrow instead?
talk0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Hey now! Did you completely miss what
I said before?

My granddaughter still has a lot to learn
before she can talk to a voe. How about
leaving her be?
talk0011:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0a00>It's no use. I can't hear anything they're saying
from here.

I just wanted to listen in on the<clr:0000> <clr:ffff>"<clr:0000>Voe and You<clr:ffff>"<clr:0000> class<clr:ffff>
and learn a bit.

But if I go into the classroom, Ms. Ashai will
definitely see me and kick me out.

<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I even thought <clr:0000>hiding with the voe dummies <clr:ffff>in there
would fool her, but my outfit looks different from
theirs, and she spotted me.
Maybe I can find a way to hide in the classroom
without being so obvious?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0037:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh, but I gotta be somewhere right now.
Can we talk later, please?
talk0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I really want to listen in on the class and
learn a bit...

Maybe if I try to sneak in and <clr:0000>hide with
the voe dummies<clr:ffff>, it'll work out better
this time?
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I dunno. I'm still not dressed anything
like they are, so I'd probably get
caught again.
talk0027:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL>M-m-more eye contact! Ah!


I-I-I've got to hurry to the "<clr:0000>Voe and You<clr:ffff>"
<clr:0000>class <clr:ffff>so I can ask how to talk to voe!
talk0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I'm on my way to help my vaba with
her shop!

If you ever want to buy some arrows or
some...Chuchu jelly? Yeah, Chuchu jelly!
You should come by, OK?
talk0029:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I was sure I'd be able to hear the lesson
today. <sp:5:1:0>I was wrong though...
talk0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Sleep>I will...<sp:5:0:0>get into the class... <sp:5:0:0>Just you wait
and see... <sp:5:0:0>Tomorrow...
talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM_01>L-little Gerudo aren't supposed to talk
to voe!

And I'm a little Gerudo, so that means
I have to stop talking to you now!
talk0019:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I'm helping out at my vaba's shop!


My big sister Kalani taught me a bunch of
stuff, so I'm really good at explaining
things now too!
